options.content:
# Portfolio 4: Advanced Database Analytics

This dashboard demonstrates advanced SQL techniques and data analysis tailored to the available dataset.

**Analyses:**
1. **Network of Influence (Deep Join)**: Uncovers hidden links between clients and ex-politicians via agencies.
2. **Lobbying Efficiency (Computed Metric)**: Calculates 'Spending per Employee' by joining financial data with employee counts, identifying high-leverage organizations.
3. **Spending Distribution (Bucketing)**: Categorizes organizations into budget classes (Low/Mid/High) using SQL Case logic.

panels.title: Top Lobbying Efficiency (Spend per Head)
panels.description: Calculates the average spending per employee (Full Time Equivalent). High numbers indicate small teams with massive budgets (high leverage).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  li.name_text AS name,
  (fe.expenses_to_eur / GREATEST(emp.employee_fte, 1.0)) AS spend_per_head
FROM register_entry re
JOIN lobbyist_identity li ON re.id = li.entry_id
JOIN financial_expenses fe ON re.id = fe.entry_id
JOIN employees_involved emp ON re.id = emp.entry_id
WHERE fe.expenses_to_eur IS NOT NULL 
  AND emp.employee_fte > 0
ORDER BY spend_per_head DESC
LIMIT 15;

SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN expenses_to_eur < 20000 THEN 'Low Budget (<20k)'
    WHEN expenses_to_eur < 100000 THEN 'Mid Budget (20k-100k)'
    WHEN expenses_to_eur < 500000 THEN 'High Budget (100k-500k)'
    ELSE 'Whales (>500k)'
  END AS budget_tier,
  COUNT(*) AS value
FROM financial_expenses
WHERE expenses_to_eur IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY budget_tier
ORDER BY value DESC;

panels.title: Network of Influence: Indirect Government Access
panels.description: Shows 'Hidden' connections: Companies (Clients) that hire Agencies which employ Ex-Politicians.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    cco.name AS "Auftraggeber (Client)",
    li.name_text AS "Beauftragte Agentur",
    COALESCE(ep.last_name || ', ' || ep.first_name, li.name_text) AS "Ex-Politiker im Team",
    cl.de AS "Ehemalige Funktion"
FROM contract_client_org cco
-- Join Path: Client -> Contract -> Agency
JOIN contract_clients cc ON cco.clients_id = cc.id
JOIN contract_item c_item ON cc.contract_item_id = c_item.id
JOIN contracts c ON c_item.parent_id = c.id
JOIN register_entry re ON c.entry_id = re.id
JOIN lobbyist_identity li ON re.id = li.entry_id
-- Check for Government Background (Entrusted Person or Legal Rep)
LEFT JOIN entrusted_person ep ON li.id = ep.identity_id
LEFT JOIN legal_representative lr ON li.id = lr.identity_id
JOIN recent_government_function rgf 
    ON (ep.recent_gov_function_id = rgf.id OR lr.recent_gov_function_id = rgf.id)
LEFT JOIN code_label cl ON rgf.type_label_id = cl.id
WHERE rgf.id IS NOT NULL
LIMIT 100;

panels.title: Finanzielle Rankings (Top Budget)
panels.description: Top spenders ranking using SQL Window Function RANK().

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    rank as "Rang",
    name as "Organisation",
    expenses as "Budget (EUR)"
FROM (
    SELECT
        COALESCE(li.name_text, li.company_name) AS name,
        fe.expenses_to_eur AS expenses,
        RANK() OVER (
            ORDER BY fe.expenses_to_eur DESC NULLS LAST
        ) AS rank
    FROM financial_expenses fe
    JOIN lobbyist_identity li ON fe.entry_id = li.entry_id
) AS ranked_stats
WHERE rank <= 20
ORDER BY rank ASC;
